ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to delete the Invite resource from.

ChannelSid.description: The SID of the [Channel](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/channels) the Invite resource to delete belongs to. This value can be the Channel resource's `sid` or `unique_name`.

Sid.description: The SID of the Invite resource to delete.
